_sText:
The Story

Counter Terrorist
-----------------
CT found a group of terrorists in the act of adding weapons to their stockpile (obviously to do no good). The group is well known, and must be stopped. The mission is to take control of the compound, and sieze everything that isn't bolted down. They have been authorized to elliminate any resistance. 

Terrorist
----------
T are closing a deal with an illegal weapons supplier. The guns and ammo are needed desperately to support their many cells within the city. During the deal, a CT unit infiltrates the compound. The guns, ammo and money must be saved at all costs. 


P.S. Yes this map was based on a CoD4 map called Showdown. 

Special thanks to 
-----------------
The members of Warlock Prime for beta testing

SGT_Kick_ur_Ass for the dust arch doorway prefab located at http://www.fpsbanana.com/prefabs/330. 

Not sure who made this Advanced Letters prefab located at http://www.fpsbanana.com/prefabs/517. 

Thank you everyone.
